data.text:
After the Selection Race, one of the horsegirls, 
Tap Dance City, came up to me. And now, she and I...
data.processed:
󠁿After the Selection Race, one of the horsegirls, 
󠁿Tap Dance City, came up to me. And now, she and I...

data.text: ...Are having a barbecue.
data.processed: 󠁿...Are having a barbecue.

data.text:
She entered the race to find out if she could become 
the "world's greatest horsegirl." The result:
data.processed:
󠁿She entered the race to find out if she could become 
󠁿the "world's greatest horsegirl." The result:

data.text: A pretty unremarkable 9th place...
data.processed: 󠁿A pretty unremarkable 9th place...

data.text: Starting from the back and no stamina to back it up! She really did use it all up by dancing before the race even started, eh?
data.name: Veteran Trainer B
data.processed: 󠁿Starting from the back and no stamina to back it up! 󠁿She really did use it all up by dancing before 󠁿the race even started, eh?

data.text:
The experienced trainers criticized her to no end. I turned 
a blind eye and wrote down her lap time off my stopwatch.
data.processed:
󠁿The experienced trainers criticized her to no end. I turned 
󠁿a blind eye and wrote down her lap time off my stopwatch.

data.text: Ignoring her lack of stamina from dancing, she did have a very bad start, and she never came back from that.
data.processed: 󠁿Ignoring her lack of stamina from dancing, she did have 󠁿a very bad start, and she never came back from that.

data.text:
She ran using the "betweener" strategy until the end. 
Her time for the last 3 furlongs was 38.5s.
data.processed:
󠁿She ran using the "betweener" strategy until the end. 
󠁿Her time for the last 3 furlongs was 38.5s.

data.text:
She didn't have the speed to come back with her last 
spurt... She'd need to shave off at least 1 more second.
data.processed:
󠁿She didn't have the speed to come back with her last 
󠁿spurt... She'd need to shave off at least 1 more second.

data.text:
She'd do well to practice her starts, as well as switching 
to the leader or runner strategy. It didn't look like she 
had trouble with pacing, after all.
data.processed:
󠁿She'd do well to practice her starts, as well as switching 
󠁿to the leader or runner strategy. It didn't look like she 
󠁿had trouble with pacing, after all.

data.text: Hmm? You got all that from one race?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Hmm? You got all that from one race?

data.text:
Her sudden whisper in my ear startled me, 
and I dropped my notebook.
data.processed:
󠁿Her sudden whisper in my ear startled me, 
󠁿and I dropped my notebook.

data.text:
Hahaha! You sure get spooked easily! 
...So, this is what you were mumbling about...?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Hahaha! You sure get spooked easily! 
󠁿...So, this is what you were mumbling about...?

data.text:
Hmm... 
You like meat, buddy?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Hmm... 
󠁿You like meat, buddy?

data.text:
Yo Tap, congrats on finding a trainer! When I saw you carry 
him over your shoulder, I thought you'd kidnapped him!
data.name: Horsegirl with a hairband
data.processed:
󠁿Yo Tap, congrats on finding a trainer! When I saw you carry 
󠁿him over your shoulder, I thought you'd kidnapped him!

data.text:
I'm so happy for you! We were worried 
you'd never ever debut!
data.name: Girl with brown-dyed hair
data.processed:
󠁿I'm so happy for you! We were worried 
󠁿you'd never ever debut!

data.text:
...She's getting a lot of praise here, but we never agreed 
on anything. In fact, she pulled a bag over my head 
and carried me over here without my permission!
data.processed:
󠁿...She's getting a lot of praise here, but we never agreed 
󠁿on anything. In fact, she pulled a bag over my head 
󠁿and carried me over here without my permission!

data.text: Congrats on getting a trainer, Tap!
data.name: Tap's Friends
data.processed: 󠁿Congrats on getting a trainer, Tap!

data.text: Ahaha! We haven't agreed on anything yet, though!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Ahaha! We haven't agreed on anything yet, though!

data.text: Really?!
data.name: Girl with pigtails
data.processed: 󠁿Really?!

data.text:
I'm only just getting started showing them what I'm 
made of! My race today was absolutely dreadful!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿I'm only just getting started showing them what I'm 
󠁿made of! My race today was absolutely dreadful!

data.text: Hey, do you wanna make your scribbles into a reality?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Hey, do you wanna make your scribbles into a reality?

data.text:
It was a great read! It's detailed like a ship's journey log! 
You could overcome the stormiest seas with this!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿It was a great read! It's detailed like a ship's journey log! 
󠁿You could overcome the stormiest seas with this!

data.text:
Ah, such wonderful strategies! And I'm going to 
bring them to fruition! How about it?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Ah, such wonderful strategies! And I'm going to 
󠁿bring them to fruition! How about it?

data.text:
What a request. Who'd expect that to come from the 
girl who placed 9th at the Selection Race...? But...
data.processed:
󠁿What a request. Who'd expect that to come from the 
󠁿girl who placed 9th at the Selection Race...? But...

data.text: The show must go on... right? Help me get rid of my bad rap from the Selection Race, okay?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿The show must go on... right? Help me get rid of 󠁿my bad rap from the Selection Race, okay?

data.text: ...I couldn't help it. She just radiates confidence.
data.processed: 󠁿...I couldn't help it. She just radiates confidence.

data.text:
After wrapping up the barbecue, 
she took me to her "play area."
data.processed:
󠁿After wrapping up the barbecue, 
󠁿she took me to her "play area."

data.text: Let's see... According to your notes, I suck at the final spurt. A frontrunning strategy is a must, then!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: Hold it! I wanna see you run one more time.
choices.processed: <size=38>Hold it! I wanna see you run one more time.</size>

choices.text: Hold it! I wanna see you run one more time.
choices.processed: <size=38>Hold it! I wanna see you run one more time.</size>

data.processed: 󠁿Let's see... According to your notes, I suck at the 󠁿final spurt. A frontrunning strategy is a must, then!

data.text:
I want to make sure that her 9th place really was due to 
her bad last spurt, or simply because of a lack of stamina.

choices.text: (Does she have what it takes to be a runner?)
choices.processed: <size=36>(Does she have what it takes to be a runner?)</size>

data.processed:
󠁿I want to make sure that her 9th place really was due to 
󠁿her bad last spurt, or simply because of a lack of stamina.

data.text:
*huff* Haha! Hup! 
So this is what is's like to be a true... runner!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿*huff* Haha! Hup! 
󠁿So this is what is's like to be a true... runner!

data.text:
Haha! And? 
Did I meet your expectations?
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Haha! And? 
󠁿Did I meet your expectations?

data.text:
What?! ...Gosh, talk about strict. 
Well okay, let's do this!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿What?! ...Gosh, talk about strict. 
󠁿Well okay, let's do this!

data.text:
I'm using my stopwatch to time her. She already 
made up 0.59s. It looks like my intuition was spot on.
data.processed:
󠁿I'm using my stopwatch to time her. She already 
󠁿made up 0.59s. It looks like my intuition was spot on.

data.text:
*pant* *pant* Ahhh... Yo, Trainer! You'd better 
have written "passes as runner with flying colors!"
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿*pant* *pant* Ahhh... Yo, Trainer! You'd better 
󠁿have written "passes as runner with flying colors!"

data.text:
It does look like she's got the qualities for it. 
I think she might be able to follow my race schedule 
as well as my training routine...
data.processed:
󠁿It does look like she's got the qualities for it. 
󠁿I think she might be able to follow my race schedule 
󠁿as well as my training routine...

data.text:
I'm gonna do a warm-up. 
Tap, wanna run like... 2000m with me?
data.name: Horsegirl with sunglasses

choices.text: Hmm? You're gonna run with her?

data.processed:
󠁿I'm gonna do a warm-up. 
󠁿Tap, wanna run like... 2000m with me?

data.text: No. Not just running, we're racing! Your plan needs opponents, right? This is the perfect opportunity!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿No. Not just running, we're racing! Your plan 󠁿needs opponents, right? This is the perfect opportunity!

data.text:
There's two more gals who declined offers from Tracen 
who'll join in. How's that sound?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: I'm not too sure about this...
I'm not too sure about this...

data.processed:
󠁿There's two more gals who declined offers from Tracen 
󠁿who'll join in. How's that sound?

data.text: Oh! Where'd that confidence go? And you said I could win with your strategy?
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: I just... Haven't got enough data yet.

data.processed: 󠁿Oh! Where'd that confidence go? 󠁿And you said I could win with your strategy?

data.text:
No race is the same. You need to thorougly understand 
the situation and your opponents. There is no one 
perfect strategy that always guarantees a win.

choices.text: I don't even have all the data on you yet.
choices.processed: <size=40>I don't even have all the data on you yet.</size>

choices.text: I don't even have all the data on you yet.
choices.processed: <size=40>I don't even have all the data on you yet.</size>

data.processed:
󠁿No race is the same. You need to thorougly understand 
󠁿the situation and your opponents. There is no one 
󠁿perfect strategy that always guarantees a win.

data.text:
...You're saying you need more time? 
Oh man, and I thought I did so well just now.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿...You're saying you need more time? 
󠁿Oh man, and I thought I did so well just now.

data.text:
Ahaha! Too bad, Tap! 
We'll call it off for now. Let's move it to...
data.name: Horsegirl with a hairband

choices.text: I'd like to get your times as well at some point.
choices.processed: <size=35>I'd like to get your times as well at some point.</size>

choices.text: I'd like to get your times as well at some point.
choices.processed: <size=35>I'd like to get your times as well at some point.</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Ahaha! Too bad, Tap! 
󠁿We'll call it off for now. Let's move it to...

data.text: Oh, woah! ...Okaaay.
data.name: Horsegirl with a hairband
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, woah! ...Okaaay.

data.text: Ah! I'm finished! Let's stop here...
data.name: Horsegirl with a hairband
data.processed: 󠁿Ah! I'm finished! Let's stop here...

data.text:
*huff* ...And, data maniac? Surely you've got 
enough measurements by now...!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿*huff* ...And, data maniac? Surely you've got 
󠁿enough measurements by now...!

data.text:
I feel like I might as well go for "Great Escape" at this point! 
I wish to be like the Japan Cup's Ace!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿I feel like I might as well go for "Great Escape" at this point! 
󠁿I wish to be like the Japan Cup's Ace!

data.text: Yeah! Ace was the strongest challenger on the track! Leading the entire world! She's unlike anyone!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah! Ace was the strongest challenger on the track! 󠁿Leading the entire world! She's unlike anyone!

data.text:
Even when it seemed like she was gonna get overtaken, 
she held strong and persevered! You get my drift? 
She's legendary!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿Even when it seemed like she was gonna get overtaken, 
󠁿she held strong and persevered! You get my drift? 
󠁿She's legendary!

data.text:
Yes, that's why she captured me! I came all the way from 
America because of her, all by myself!
data.name: Tap Dance City

choices.text: You came to Japan by yourself...?!

data.processed:
󠁿Yes, that's why she captured me! I came all the way from 
󠁿America because of her, all by myself!

data.text:
Tap's incredible for entering Tracen! She was a nobody 
and knew nobody. But that's Tap for you!
data.name: Girl with brown-dyed hair
data.processed:
󠁿Tap's incredible for entering Tracen! She was a nobody 
󠁿and knew nobody. But that's Tap for you!

data.text: Things always work out in the end! I want to live life my way! Working and playing in freedom!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Things always work out in the end! I want to live life 󠁿my way! Working and playing in freedom!

data.text:
...That way, I'll end up with a castle where me 
and my friends can play until we're grannies!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed:
󠁿...That way, I'll end up with a castle where me 
󠁿and my friends can play until we're grannies!

data.text:
That's right. When I first met her at the riverside, 
she proclaimed her dream of building a castle.

choices.text: Your dream is to build that castle?
Your dream is to build that castle?

data.processed:
󠁿That's right. When I first met her at the riverside, 
󠁿she proclaimed her dream of building a castle.

data.text: Yeah!
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿Yeah!

data.text: And I'll gather the funds... Through winning races.
data.name: Tap Dance City
data.processed: 󠁿And I'll gather the funds... Through winning races.
